Frigid_Smash.help: You slam the ground with both of your fists, unleashing a small shockwave of death energy around you. This causes cold damage and negative energy damage over time on all opponents around you. Additionally, the affected targets will suffer reduced resistance to cold and negative energy attacks. Finally, the longer you remain in combat, the more likely you will sap the target's soul, causing them to suffer increased endurance cost for all powers.
Frigid_Smash.shortHelp: PBAoE, Moderate DMG (Cold), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), -RES(Foe, Cold & Negative Energy), Chance for +EndCost(Foe), Knockback(Foe), Chance for +EndCost(Foe)
Frigid_Smash.targetHelp: You are suffering negative energy damage over time. Your resistance against cold and negative energy attacks has been reduced, and you may suffer increased endurance costs.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Frigid_Stomp.help: You crush your opponents with a forceful blow from your foot. The death energy shockwave from this attack causes cold damage and negative energy damage over time. Additionally, affected targets suffer reduced damage output and may be knocked into the air. Finally, the longer you remain in combat, the more likely you will sap the target's soul, causing them to suffer increased endurance cost for all powers.
Frigid_Stomp.shortHelp: PBAoE, Moderate DMG (Cold), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), -DMG(Foe, All), Chance for +EndCost(Foe), Knockup(Foe), Chance for +EndCost(Foe)
Frigid_Stomp.targetHelp: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and your damage output has been reduced. You may suffer increased endurance costs.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Frigid_Beam.help: You focus death energy into both of your fists before unleashing a deadly beam at a target. The affected target and all those within a cone between you suffer cold damage and negative energy damage over time. Additionally, all affected targets lose endurance and have lowered resistance to all damage. Finally, the longer you remain in combat, the more likely you will sap the target's soul, causing them to suffer increased endurance cost for all powers.
Frigid_Beam.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Superior DMG(Cold), Moderate DoT(Negative Energy), -RES(Foe, All), -End(Foe), Chance for +EndCost(Foe)
Frigid_Beam.targetHelp: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and are losing endurance. Additionally, your resistance to all forms of damage has been reduced. You may suffer increased endurance costs.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Frigid_Blast.help: You fire a blast of death energy at a single opponent. This bolt causes cold damage and negative energy damage over time. Additionally, it lowers your chance to hit and both movement and combat speeds. Finally, the longer you remain in combat, the more likely you will sap the target's soul, causing them to suffer increased endurance cost for all powers.
Frigid_Blast.shortHelp: Ranged, Minor DMG(Cold), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), -ToHit(Foe), -Rech(Foe), -Speed(Foe, All), Chance for +EndCost(Foe)
Frigid_Blast.targetHelp: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and are losing endurance. Additionally, your chance to hit, movement speed and combat speed are all lowered. You may suffer increased endurance costs.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Frigid_Grasp.help: You freeze a single target in a mass of death energy. The target is held and suffers cold damage, as well as negative energy damage over time. The target also suffers lingering reductions in their movement and recharge speeds after the hold ends. Finally, the longer you remain in combat, the more likely you will sap the target's soul, causing them to suffer increased endurance cost for all powers.
Frigid_Grasp.shortHelp: Ranged (Secondary Target), Moderate DMG(Cold), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), Hold (Foe), Grounded(Foe), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), Chance for +EndCost(Foe)
Frigid_Grasp.targetHelp: You have been caught in a mass of frozen death energy, causing you to be held and suffer negative energy damage over time. When the hold ends, you will suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. There is also the potential for your powers to cost more endurance to execute.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Frigid_Enervation.help: You envelop your target in death energy, causing cold damage and negative energy damage over time. The density of the energy overwhelms the target's body, lowering regeneration and recovery while also increasing the endurance cost of powers.
Frigid_Enervation.shortHelp: Targeted AoE (Secondary Target), High DMG(Cold), Moderate DMG(Negative Energy), +EndCost(Foe), -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe)
Frigid_Enervation.targetHelp: Your regeneration and recovery have been reduced and powers cost more endurance to use.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Deathless_Shell.help: You have natural defenses against cold and negative energy damage, though these defenses are imperfect.
Deathless_Shell.targetHelp: You have natural defenses against cold and negative energy damage, though these defenses are imperfect.
